live_updates: Services are disrupted due to a Hydro outage in the area.  Once BC Hydro has restored power, services in the area should begin working. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 7:00pm. Please stay tuned for updates.
37173.summary: Some customers in the Juniper Ridge area of Kamloops are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37173.title: May 8 – Kamloops (Juniper Ridge) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
